ComicInfo.Penciller: Adam Warren,Jason Lutes,Peter Doherty,Sibin Slavkovic,Sibin Slavkovic,Jason Lutes,Adam Warren,Peter Doherty
ComicInfo.Summary: Adam Warren dishes up mayhem and destruction in the form of The Dirty Pair! From Darko Macan and Peter Doherty's new tale, Carson of Venus, comes the question, "What do you do if your girlfriend is kidnapped by a tribe of men?" Bob Fingerman and Sibin provide a new outrageous Mask tale that will lead into a brand new series, with a special cover by Doug Mahnke. And Jason Lutes and Ed Brubaker continue The Fall.
ComicInfo.Title: Toys in the Attick; The Fall; Start the Violence; Carson of Venus
